title: Implement Variable.new
body_html:
This implements Variable.new(). We'll need to modify it when we make the torch.Tensor constructors return the combined Variable/Tensor type, but it should be a useful starting point for that too.

I've been putting a bunch of Tensor/Variable functions in torch/csrc/utils (tensor_new, tensor_list, tensor_numpy). Once we merge Variable and Tensor we should find a better place for them to live.

cc @zdevito this adds unsafeStorageFromTH to at::Type

cc @zdevito this adds unsafeStorageFromTH to at::Type
body:
This implements Variable.new(). We'll need to modify it when we make the `torch.Tensor` constructors return the combined Variable/Tensor type, but it should be a useful starting point for that too.

I've been putting a bunch of Tensor/Variable functions in `torch/csrc/utils` (tensor_new, tensor_list, tensor_numpy). Once we merge Variable and Tensor we should find a better place for them to live.

cc @zdevito this adds `unsafeStorageFromTH` to `at::Type`
